featured.text: A magician named Dedi of Dedsnefu was reported to have performed for the pharaoh, or the king.

definition.zh_def: 一種用於表達奉獻或專注於某事的行為或狀態。
definition.en_def: A term used to express the act or state of dedicating oneself to a particular task or purpose.
definition.example: She decided to dedi her time to volunteering at the local shelter.
